name: Crooked Hearts
description:
A knight sets out on a journey that might change more than just his own fate. As he comes across fragments of memories and a monster to face, sympathy follows for the devil. 

Will you be able to find the pieces of the broken relic to confront the shadows that lurk on the edge? Will you spare the monster or will you slay them mercilessly?

Game Description:

Controls: 

  • W/A/S/D to Move
  • Left Mouse Button to Swing your Weapon

Honorable Mentions:

Lighting and Background: Adwit

Enemies and Weapons Art Assets: Kenney
